          <title>
            <string language="en">Slowing down of a bicycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verlangsamen eines Fahrrades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ralentissement d'une bicyclette</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the forces (blue arrows) that make a bicycle slow down.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die Kräfte 
(blaue Pfeile) diese ein Fahrrad langsamen Abstieg bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que les forces 
(flèches bleues) ces font une bicyclette ralentir.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as forças (setas

          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
